frontmatter.title: Colors
frontmatter.intro: Our primary colors are blue, red and white. This color combination is very recognisable for our customers. It's important that we use our colors consequently.

children.value: We strive to design with a consistent color balance. A lot of white, blue as a primary color and red as an accent color.
Our complimentary colors are hues based on our primary colors.
Black, white and some shades of grey

properties.ariaLabel: black white and some shades of grey permalink

children.value: These colors are for specific. usage. Use with care.

page.html:
Primary Colors

Länsförsäkringar Blue

RGB 0/90/160

HEX #005aa0

Länsförsäkringar Red

RGB 227/6/19

HEX #E30613

Color balance

We strive to design with a consistent color balance. A lot of white, blue as a primary color and red as an accent color.

Complimentary colors

Our complimentary colors are hues based on our primary colors.
